statements: INSERT INTO incident_response (incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, incident_description, affected_systems, response_plan, regulatory_guidelines) VALUES ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '2022-02-15 08:30:00', 'Data Breach', 'Customer data leaked due to a vulnerability in the system', 10, 'Isolate affected systems, conduct forensic analysis', 'Notify customers and authorities as per GDPR guidelines');

INSERT INTO incident_response (incident_type, affected_systems, response_plan, regulatory_guidelines, incident_date, incident_description, incident_id) VALUES ('Phishing Attack', 5, 'Educate employees on identifying phishing emails', 'Report incident to CERT', '2022-02-16 10:00:00', 'Employees received suspicious emails attempting to steal credentials', '234e5678-f90c-45e6-bc23-789012345678');

INSERT INTO incident_response (incident_description, incident_type, response_plan, incident_date, regulatory_guidelines, affected_systems, incident_id) VALUES ('Unauthorized access to data center', 'Security Breach', 'Implement two-factor authentication for data center access', '2022-02-17 15:45:00', 'Notify authorities and initiate forensic investigation', 3, '345e90ab-12bd-67ce-8901-d234567890bc');

INSERT INTO incident_response VALUES ('456d78e9-abcd-12ef-901a-bcdef2345678', '2022-02-18 13:20:00', 'Ransomware Attack', 'Systems encrypted demanding ransom payment', 7, 'Restore systems from backups, improve system security', 'Follow guidelines from cybersecurity agencies');

INSERT INTO incident_response (response_plan, regulatory_guidelines, affected_systems, incident_description, incident_id, incident_type, incident_date) VALUES ('Shut down compromised servers, disconnect from the network', 'Contact data protection authority for breach notification', 12, 'Malware infection spreading across the network', '567f90ab-cdef-12ab-9012-345678901abc', 'Malware Infection', '2022-02-19 09:00:00');

INSERT INTO incident_response (incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, incident_description, affected_systems, response_plan, regulatory_guidelines) VALUES ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '2021-09-15 10:30:00', 'Data Breach', 'Sensitive data leaked due to security vulnerability.', 10, 'Activate incident response team and isolate affected systems.', 'Follow GDPR guidelines for data breach notification.');

INSERT INTO incident_response (incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, incident_description, affected_systems, response_plan, regulatory_guidelines) VALUES ('423e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '2021-08-20 15:45:00', 'Ransomware Attack', 'Systems encrypted by ransomware demanding payment.', 5, 'Disconnect affected systems and restore from backups.', 'Comply with cybersecurity regulations for reporting ransomware incidents.');

INSERT INTO incident_response (incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, incident_description, affected_systems, response_plan, regulatory_guidelines) VALUES ('223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '2021-10-05 08:00:00', 'Phishing Campaign', 'Emails with malicious links targeting employees.', 15, 'Educate employees on detecting phishing emails.', 'Refer to industry best practices for handling phishing incidents.');

INSERT INTO incident_response (incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, incident_description, affected_systems, response_plan, regulatory_guidelines) VALUES ('323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '2021-07-12 12:20:00', 'Denial of Service (DoS)', 'Website flooded with excessive traffic, causing downtime.', 8, 'Implement rate limiting and monitor network traffic.', 'Follow regulatory requirements for reporting service disruptions.');

INSERT INTO incident_response (incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, incident_description, affected_systems, response_plan, regulatory_guidelines) VALUES ('523e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '2021-11-30 09:10:00', 'Insider Threat', 'Employee attempting unauthorized access to sensitive data.', 3, 'Revoke access rights and conduct security audit.', 'Abide by data protection laws regarding insider threat investigations.');
